metadata.title: Selection of highly variable genes and dimensionality reduction

annotations.note: Compute 3,000 highly variable features in a batch‑aware manner using the scanpy highly_variable_genes function (flavor='seurat_v3', batch_key='bio_sample').
Use these 3,000 features to compute a 50‑dimensional representation of the data using principal component analysis (PCA).
Compute a k‑nearest‑neighbour (kNN) graph (n_neighbors=30, metric='cosine') from the PCA representation.
